Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Volume_PDS3.archive_status_note: The database contains a value of NULL. For the purposes of this exercise, the value was replaced with IN_QUEUE
Volume_PDS3.volume_name: MARS GLOBAL SURVEYOR MAPPING SPICE FILES (6)
Volume_PDS3.description:
This volume contains the complete set of the Mars Global Surveyor SPICE Kernels for the 16th, 17th and 18th 28-day cycles of the mapping phase of the mission.
Coverage of this volume and previous volumes containing portions of the MGS SPICE data set are given in the table below
VOLUME ID START TIME STOP TIME --------- ------------------- ------------------- MGSP_0001 1996-11-06T08:00:00 1998-05-28T00:00:00 MGSP_0002 1998-05-28T00:00:00 1999-03-09T00:00:00 MGSP_0003 1999-03-09T01:00:00 1999-06-02T00:00:00 MGSP_0004 1999-06-02T00:00:00 1999-08-25T00:00:00 MGSP_0005 1999-08-25T00:00:00 1999-11-17T00:00:00 MGSP_0006 1999-11-17T00:00:00 2000-02-09T00:00:00 MGSP_0007 2000-02-09T00:00:00 2000-05-03T00:00:00 MGSP_0008 2000-05-03T00:00:00 2000-07-26T00:00:00
